title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a king or ruler in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a king or ruler in a dream by the most famous interpreters This vision is considered the focus of many people’s research, due to the presence of the symbol of a king, ruler, or president in a dream in any form. It includes the king himself, and perhaps may God bless him and grant him peace, approaching him and speaking to him. A different interpretation, so we will put it in your hands. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a king or ruler in a dream according to what was stated in the interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a king or ruler in a dream. The king or ruler is considered the supreme authority of the country, and the difference in the name given to the country’s ruler comes from the difference in the system The ruling therein. The ruler is the leader, but what is the interpretation of the dream of seeing a king or ruler in a dream, we will explain that below: When a person sees in a dream a king or many kings, this is a sign that the person will gain power. It also indicates that the dreamer will gain influence or will be promoted to An important position. This interpretation is in case you see an Arab king in a dream. But when one sees a non-Arab king in a dream, this is a warning. It warns the person against showing him serious injustice and exposing him to slander. While in the case of seeing a foreign queen in a dream, this indicates the dreamer’s journey. And estrangement from his family and homeland, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about lemons in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabul, especially what is the interpretation of the dream when you see a ruler in a dream? A person may feel astonished to see a ruler or king in his dream, and perhaps this matter has not occupied his mind before, so you find him searching for Interpretation of his dream of seeing the ruler in a dream is through searching for machines. I will explain to you the following: According to what was stated in Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, seeing a ruler in a dream is evidence of wisdom and knowledge. It is also an indication of someone who has authority over an employer or a family fortune teller. Also, seeing a ruler in a dream indicates that the dreamer has a social personality and enjoys love. People who stand by his side in adversity and adversity. Also, seeing a ruler with good quality in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will gain knowledge or will lead him to justice. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing disgrace from someone you love by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of seeing a guardian in a dream? Is it considered the position of a guardian or guardian? The covenant is one of the new positions in some Arab countries, especially in the Arab Gulf countries, and this is due to the royal rule based on hereditary transmission of power. In this context, we explain to anyone the interpretation of seeing a heir in a dream: Seeing an heir laughing in a dream is a good vision for its owner, which indicates that he will obtain an excellent position in the near future. While the face of the heir is disapproving in the dream, it is evidence of the wrath of God Almighty against the dreamer. But if One sees an heir becoming an heir in a dream, as this indicates the approach of his death and death. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing scratches in a dream by the most famous interpreters. What is the interpretation of a dream when seeing King Abdullah? King Abdullah is the name of each of the kings of the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan Currently, King Abdullah is one of the kings of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, but he died before that

title: Learn about the interpretation of airplanes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of airplanes in a dream: Airplanes are a means of transportation that helps a person move from one country to another in the least amount of time and without any effort. However, seeing airplanes in a dream will not be good or there is another source behind the dream he is dreaming of. Caution must be exercised and in the following lines we will explain the details. Interpretation of airplanes in a dream Seeing airplanes in a dream for the dreamer indicates that he will fulfill his desires in life in the coming days, which is what he has been trying to achieve for a long time and cannot be achieved. Seeing airplanes in a man’s vision means that he will find a job opportunity His financial situation improves for the better, and airplanes in a woman’s dream symbolize that she will give birth to a male in the coming days, after getting rid of experiences. And the adversities and health conditions that affected her in the past. Interpretation of airplanes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing airplanes in a dream for the dreamer indicates the acceptance of her repentance and her response to the supplication that she always prays to her Lord until she reaches Him. Seeing a plane crash in a dream for a girl symbolizes her failure in her studies as a result of not Her constant acquisition of topics due to her interest in useless things and following bad friends. The Asrar website for the interpretation of dreams is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write. A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of airplanes in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says that seeing airplanes in For a man, a dream indicates the enormous wealth that he will accumulate in the near future as a result of his hard work and obtaining a promotion and a large reward. Seeing airplanes in the dreamer’s dream symbolizes his imminent marriage contract with the girl he wanted to marry for a long time and with whom he will live with steadfastness and affection. Interpretation of airplanes in a dream for a single woman. Seeing airplanes in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she knows the news of her acceptance of her trip to work abroad in order to learn something new about her field. And she will be one of those who excel in it. Seeing airplanes in a dream for a girl symbolizes the good news that she will learn in the coming days, and her life will change from sadness and anxiety to happiness and relief. Airplanes in a dream’s sleep indicate that she will soon meet a rich man of good morals and religion. Interpretation of a trip in a dream for a single woman: Seeing flying in A dream for a single woman indicates that she enjoys a stable life with her family and freedom of opinion that makes her able to rely on herself and face adversity with great skill. Interpretation of airplanes in a dream for a married woman. Seeing airplanes in a dream for a married woman indicates a decent life in which she lives with her husband and children after dealing with the differences that arise. She came on her way because of haters and those who resent her. Seeing airplanes in the dreamer’s vision indicates her ability to succeed in work and marital life and reconcile them in the future for her, which her children will be proud of, and airplanes in the dreamer’s sleep indicate that he knows a group of happy news about her. Husband in the coming days. Interpretation of airplanes in a dream for a pregnant woman

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing meat in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi and the most important clues

preview.html: Seeing meat in a dream is a vision that is often repeated in a dream by many people, and many people seek to know the meaning of this vision and the good or evil that this vision brings. The interpretation of this vision varies according to the viewer, whether he is a man, a woman, or a girl. Interpretation Dreaming about seeing meat in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, and seeing meat in a dream shows bad news, sorrows, worries, and disasters. If it is raw, and if it is cooked, it means lawful money, spoils, and profit. In the market. Meat is considered a useful food for building the body, but without excessive consumption. There are many types of meat and different cooking methods, such as red and white meat, which are prepared cooked, grilled, or boiled. But what is meat in a dream has many differences in interpretation according to the social status of the pioneer, that is, whether he is married, married, single, or divorced. For this reason, we will review with you through this article the most important and prominent interpretations that Ibn Sirin received in his interpretation of seeing meat in a dream. Interpretation of seeing meat in a dream by Ibn Sirin: According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation: Seeing roasted meat and stews is evidence of the goodness and livelihood that the dreamer will obtain without hard effort. Eating lamb meat in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will soon obtain an inheritance. If a person eats camel meat, this indicates that this person will gain from the enemy. If this meat is a bird, this indicates food, but after much fatigue. If a person sees in His dream is that he is buying human meat, it means that this person is eating from other people’s money. Ibn Sirin says: Seeing meat in a dream indicates an abundance of goodness if that meat is cooked. According to Ibn Sirin, eating cooked meat, especially lamb, in a dream Evidence that the dreamer will accidentally meet a person with whom he has a relationship. If the meat is raw, this indicates many problems and diseases. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing meat in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about cutting raw meat with a knife by Ibn Al-Nabulsi: This is what Ibn Al-Nabulsi said. See meat indicates cutting A dream into very small pieces indicates that this person will earn a lot of money, but he will waste it. If a person sees that he is cutting meat, this indicates that this person will get rid of the problems and fears that surround him, and if this person is alone, this indicates that he will get married soon. If A person sees that he is cutting tender meat, this indicates that this person will get sick and die. But if a person sees that the color of meat is yellow, this indicates that this person will be seriously ill. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing barbecue in a dream for a man. Interpretation of a dream about eating meat Cooked for a single woman: Lawyers in dream interpretation say that if an unmarried girl sees in her dreams that she is cooking meat, this means that she will communicate with a man, but she will cause him a lot of problems that will lead to his bankruptcy. If he sees that he is eating the meat of another woman, this indicates This woman is doing forbidden things

title: Interpretation of seeing entering a mosque in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing entering a mosque in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Evidence of these dreams, and during this article we will also inform you of the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of entering the mosque in a dream.Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of entering the mosque in a dream. There are many of these meanings and connotations included in this dream if he sees it in a dream, and in most cases it is considered good news for the fortuneteller, and during This paragraph we will explain to you. The interpretation of seeing entering a mosque in a dream by Ibn Sirinho also: If a person sees the building of a mosque in a dream. This dream is evidence of his closeness to God Almighty and his following the Sunnah of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. Then if he sees that his house has turned into a mosque. This indicates On the good morals of whoever sees it, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. In addition to seeing a mosque in a dream that is lower than the level of the ground. It is evidence of the ease of things that the dreamer goes through. Likewise, if he sees in a dream building a mosque, this indicates that this person is on the straight path. As You see him sitting in the mosque in a man’s dream. It is a sign of marriage, children, and goodness that will make it easier for the fortuneteller. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the dead eating honey by Ibn Sirin in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a mosque for a married man. Many dreams are similar in the dreams of individuals, but of course they differ from each other in the interpretations they contain. And many interpretation scholars who were interested in clarifying these interpretations, and along these lines we explain to you the interpretation of a dream about a mosque for a married man: This vision is evidence that the dreamer will achieve more than his desires. Also, seeing a mosque in a dream for a married man in general indicates more wishes for him. Likewise, if a person sees a mosque in a dream, it indicates the birth of a boy, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the anus in a dream in detail from the most famous interpreters. Interpretation of the dream of sitting in the mosque. There are many dreams in which we see the mosque, but they differ in their details and of course differ in their connotations and interpretations. Which it contains and in this context we will learn about it. The interpretation of the dream of sitting in the mosque is also: If he sees him sitting in the mosque listening to the Qur’an and remembering. This is a sign that wishes and dreams will come true to a large extent in the coming days. As you see sitting in the mosque in a dream. It may be a sign of those gains. The great materialism that the dreamer will acquire, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing horses in a dream for a married and single woman in detail. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a friend in the mosque. Seeing the mosque in general is one of those good visions, which includes those interpretations that mostly indicate goodness and livelihood for the monarch, And other connotations, and along these lines we inform you. The interpretation of the dream of seeing a friend in the mosque is also: If he sees in a dream that a friend enters the mosque with some of his friends. This is evidence of good deeds done to them, as it indicates their good morals. Likewise, if a person dreams in a dream that he He entered a mosque, and there was another person who contracted his marriage there. This vision is evidence that the date of his marriage is near, and that it will take place easily. Whereas if a person sees in a dream that the mosque is...

title: Interpretation of deer in a dream

preview.html: Here is the interpretation of a deer in a dream by the great dream interpreters. In this article, God Almighty said: “O rulers, inform me of my dreams if you are a vision crossing graves.” You are sleeping, and they could also be messages from God Almighty to you, and in this article from the encyclopedia we present to you the interpretation of seeing a deer in a dream.Interpretation of a deer in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a deer in a dream by Ibn SirinThe antlers of a deer in a dream indicate that the dreamer has a strong personality, and can bear responsibility He has the ability to make good decisions. Seeing deer blood in a dream. It indicates an abundance of sustenance, an abundance of money, and the ease that comes after hardship and fatigue. If a person sees that he is running after a deer in a dream. This indicates that he is seeking to achieve his ambitions and dreams. If a person sees that he is eating deer meat in a dream. This indicates that he wants to move away from the mold of tradition. If a merchant sees a dead deer in a dream. This indicates a great loss for him. If he sees in a dream that he is killing a deer. This indicates severing his relationship with one of his close relatives. If someone sees a dead deer in his house. This indicates the death of a family member or close person, and the presence of major problems or difficulties. Also, seeing a dead deer means failure, not achieving your dreams, disappointment and despair. It is a despicable vision. Interpretation of seeing a deer in a dream for an unmarried girl by Ibn Sirin: If an unmarried girl sees a deer in a dream. This indicates the person the girl loves. And if the girl sees that she is chasing a deer; This indicates that he thinks a lot about the person he loves. If you catch a deer in a dream. This indicates her marriage to this person. If she fails, she will catch the deer. This appears after her lover, and not marrying her. If a girl dreams that she is holding the antlers of a deer. This indicates that she has great power. If he sees that he is eating a deer in a dream and the girl is trying to get money. This indicates that he will get a great job and will earn a lot of money. And if she sees in her dream that she is eating venison; This indicates an abundant diet in general. Interpretation of seeing a deer in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: If one sees in a dream that he is chasing a deer and is unable to catch it. This indicates that this person does not take advantage of the opportunities that come his way and wastes many of them. If merchants see in a dream that he was finally able to hunt a deer. This indicates the approach of a big profit and gaining a lot of money. But if the merchant sees the death of the deer; This indicates that he will suffer a huge loss in his business and money. If someone sees that he killed a deer. This indicates that he will break off his relationship with someone close to him. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is eating deer meat. This indicates that he wants to renew his life for the better and wants to break out of boring traditions. If one sees that he is hunting a deer. To hold this indicates that he is a brave person, who likes to go on adventures, and is not afraid of risks and it can also indicate that he is going through a new emotional experience. Interpretation of seeing a deer in a dream by Ibn ShaheenIf a married man or woman sees

This indicates that he wants to renew his life for the better and wants to break out of boring traditions. If one sees that he is hunting a deer. To hold this indicates that he is a brave person, who likes to go on adventures, and is not afraid of risks and it can also indicate that he is going through a new emotional experience. Seeing the name Juma in a sick person’s dream is considered good news that God will heal the dreamer from his illness. title: I dreamed that I traveled to America

preview.html: I dreamed that I traveled to America in a dream through the website Vision roy2a.com, and America is considered one of the developed countries in all fields, and many people want to travel to it, either to study or work and live there, and today through this article we will introduce you to I dreamed that I I traveled to America. For great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the condition of the dreamer, whether she is single, married, or pregnant. I dreamed that I traveled to America in a dream on the authority of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained the vision of traveling to America in a dream. It indicates abundance of sustenance and relief. From the material circumstances of the viewer. Traveling to America and facing difficulties while traveling in a dream indicates the abundance of evil people in the dreamer’s practical life and their machinations against him. I see in a dream that I am traveling to America by car, and it indicates that very promising things will happen soon in the dreamer’s life, and God knows best. See another interpretation: Interpretation of a dream about traveling to a foreign country: I dreamed that I traveled to America in a dream about free people. Seeing in a dream single people traveling to America indicates the emergence of many positive changes in her life during the coming period. Traveling to America to work on one dream says that she will soon reach a high position and a major promotion in her life. Professionalism. Seeing a single woman traveling to America with an unknown person in a dream indicates that she will marry in the near future to a young man she loves and suits her. Crying about traveling to America in one dream indicates that she will face some crises in her life, and God knows best. I dreamed that I traveled to America in a dream to get married. Seeing a woman A married woman travels to America and feels happy in a dream. It indicates the end of a difficult period that she has recently gone through. Crying while traveling in America in a singles’ dream shows that he will face many financial problems in the near future. Traveling to America by plane in a dream. A married woman stated that she will hear a lot of good news about her life. In the next few days. See another interpretation: I dreamed that I traveled to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. I dreamed that I traveled to America in a dream about a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman traveling to America in a dream says that she and the health of her child after birth, and God knows best. Traveling to America by plane in a pregnant woman’s dream states that they They made a lot of profits and gains from their work. Seeing a pregnant woman traveling to America and feeling sad in a dream indicates that she will face some health problems during the birth process, and God knows best. I dreamed that I traveled to America in a dream about a divorced woman. Seeing in a dream a divorced woman traveling to America indicates that God will compensate her for what she went through in her life and give her happiness and peace of mind. Traveling across America by car in a divorced woman’s dream indicates the end of the crises she went through in the previous period, and He will provide her with a lot of money, and God knows best. Seeing in a dream a divorced woman traveling to America by plane indicates that God He will provide her with a righteous man to marry, and God knows best

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about an owl from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretations of a dream about an owl: Seeing an owl in a dream is an annoying and frightening dream, because it is considered a destructive and frightening bird. An owl in a dream symbolizes envy, cunning and deception. The interpretations are never bad, but they carry some interpretations and positive elements. Interpretation of a dream about an owl in a dream: The owl also symbolizes a woman who is jealous and envious of the dreamer, and the owl in a dream is evidence of a serious warning of bad news that will reach the dreamer soon. Seeing an owl in a dream is a sign of her need for positive energy to complete her life, and drawing in a dream also indicates the difficult emotional life she goes through in life. Interpretation of the dream of an owl in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of an owl in a dream as a thief or a brave thief who does not He is afraid of someone, and this vision also indicates a person who has strong authority, but he is tyrannical and unjust, and if the fortuneteller is an employer, he will lose his job. Your dream will find its interpretation in seconds. A site about the secrets of dream interpretation from Google. Interpretation of a dream about an owl in a dream for a single woman. An owl in a dream symbolizes a bird with positive meanings. If an unmarried woman sees a white owl in her dream, this indicates that the groom will propose to her and marry her well. But if an unmarried woman sees a black owl, this is not an easy and miserly matter, but if she sees a colored owl, this is a sign of false feelings from people who wish for her. Good and evil, but if an owl sees a slaughter, this indicates opportunities that the unmarried woman missed and wasted. Interpretation of a dream about an owl for a married woman: An owl in a dream for a married woman is considered a lucky bird for her and is considered a great comfort in matters related to laziness, livelihood, and money. A white owl in a married woman’s dream is evidence of joy for her, and seeing an owl’s nest indicates stability and improvement in the relationship with her husband, and a chick owl in a dream is a sign of meeting a family member, soon becoming pregnant, or a stranger returning from travel, or an expatriate, or something missing. However, if the wife sees the eggs of a white owl, this means the money that he will obtain without trouble or trouble. As for seeing the feathers of a black owl, it is a good vision. Feathers in a dream in general, if they are scattered on the ground or the road, are evidence of wealth, as it expresses great Interpreters of seeing feathers in a dream, a married woman is a source of optimism and also symbolizes profit and profit in purchases and sales. Interpretation of a dream about an owl for a pregnant womanSeeing an owl in a pregnant woman’s dream is considered a good thing, especially if the owl is white, as seeing an owl in a pregnant woman’s dream It symbolizes the male child, Najib, and his messenger in the future. The white owl in a pregnant woman’s dream is better than the black owl, because the black owl in a dream indicates an evil, evil woman, but if the pregnant woman sees owl eggs hatching, then it is considered her due date. It will be an easy and easy birth and a healthy child. Interpretation of a dream about an owl for a divorced woman. Seeing an owl in a dream for a divorced woman is considered her luck in marriage and seeing an owl is good.

title: Interpretation and meaning of the appearance of an apartment in a dream by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: Interpretations of leading scholars for seeing an apartment in a dream: A person may see in his dream that he is living in an old or new apartment in the country or in the city, and he has found its owner and is residing in it, or that its owner has been sold or he has found to buy it. He may find that his walls are plain, painted or painted. All of these cases require a detailed interpretation. The apartment in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a new apartment in a dream for a man, as it is easy to live and maintain, and to go to and survive the hardship and semi-comfort that happened to him. If the apartment Full of flowers and pleasing to look at, this may indicate that the prospective husband is powerful, wealthy, and has a lot of money. If the dream owner sees that his apartment will be stolen and the thief is from the family, this is evidence that the dream owner’s condition will change for the better, and if he is sick, he will recover from his condition. Illness. Interpretation of a dream about a new apartment. The new apartment in a dream comes from its meanings. It means joy, pleasure, and gladness, and it means a change from a situation to a better and better one, and it means comfort after distress and victory after effort and hardship. What is an apartment in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin says in the interpretation of the dream For the new apartment in a dream, the house in a dream (i.e. the apartment) is the human world and its condition varies according to the visions that it sees and according to its owner. Interpretation of a dream about a new apartment in a dream for a man, as it is easy to live and maintain, and to go to it and survive the hardship and semi-comfort that happened to him If the new apartment is made of strong construction, such as iron or stone, this may indicate a long life. Interpretation of a dream about a new apartment for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing a new apartment in a dream for a single girl is that it could indicate a new beginning awaiting her in her life’s journey and it comes from the concept of The apartment in which we live (i.e. housing). Interpretation of a dream about a new apartment for an unmarried girl can indicate short joy and good news about a long engagement and happy marriage. If the apartment is full of flowers and is pleasant to look at, this may indicate that the prospective husband is strong, wealthy and has a lot Of money. In general, the more the apartment in the vision of an unmarried girl pleases the viewers, it means that the future is bright and the change in her life is for the better. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream an apartment, but it is old, it may mean that she will have problems with her feet that she may have Reasons are in front of her and she just has to think about them and think about them. Seeing the old apartment in an unmarried girl’s dream may mean that she will marry a poor man, and if she were to buy that old apartment without hesitation, it may mean that she is about to marry the person she loves, even if he is in Trouble.Interpretation of a dream about furnishing the bride’s apartment: If a girl sees in her dream that she is furnishing her apartment and furnishing it with new things, this may indicate an imminent victory and reaching the goal that she began to arrange for herself some time ago. Approximately. In general, the concept of furnishing the new bride and furnishing the bride’s apartment with furnishings is considered a change to a better condition than it is now and getting rid of the tension of her work in the past period. Interpretation of a dream about a new apartment for a married womanIf the dreamer is married, then the

preview.html: Hadout website provides you with a complete interpretation of cumin in a dream. Cumin is a plant that has many benefits that provide the human body with many useful things. Also, some people need to see cumin in a complete dream. Dear followers, here are all the testimonies and details about the interpretation of cumin in a dream in full and eating or drinking it. Follow the article. What is the dream of cumin by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin narrated in his book that he saw cumin in a complete dream as one of the visions that show the arrival of money to the dreamer. Also, seeing cumin in a dream in its entirety For a sick person, it is a testimony that God will save him from illness and his health will improve. Eating whole cumin in a dream indicates more than eating it because of illness, this is good and a sign of blessing. And everyone who eats it differently is a sign of fears and problems that the fortuneteller will experience in his next life. Grinding cumin into a complete powder in a dream testifies that he married a dreamer and found a fair woman in his life. Cumin in a dream is complete for a common woman. The interpretation of a single woman who sees cumin in a dream is a sign that she will overcome all the problems she suffers from in her life. Also, Seeing cumin in a common woman’s dream is one of the visions that indicate abundance of money, kindness, and abundance of blessings. Seeing cumin in a woman’s dream also indicates that she is approaching the date of engagement and wedding, as well as her happiness and joy. Seeing cumin seeds on a girl’s desk in a complete dream speaks of successes And successes and overcoming all stages of failure. Cumin in a dream is complete for a married woman. Seeing cumin in a dream complete for a married woman is evidence that her problems and troubles will stop and that she will recover from illness. Also, seeing cumin in a dream for a married woman is a sign of money and many benefits that she will receive. Also, seeing cumin in a dream is complete for a married woman. Seeing a woman in a dream eating whole cumin means that she is going through a period full of sadness and anxiety, and she will emerge from it, God willing. Why does a pregnant woman dream of cumin? Seeing whole cumin in a dream for a pregnant woman is desirable and testifies to her release from our followers and her smooth exit from pregnancy. Why A pregnant woman’s dream of eating cumin is an indication that she will give birth to a child that she will desire and hope for from God. Also, seeing cumin in a pregnant woman’s dream testifies that God will save her from childbirth with ease and ease. Why does a man dream of cumin? Cumin in a man’s complete dream shows that he will collect a lot. Of money, which he will achieve from halal trade and profits. Also, seeing cumin in a man’s dream means marriage, and a married man often indicates that he will marry again. Also, seeing a caravan in a dream shows that in the next period of his life he will have a good wife. If You had a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comment below and a team of experts will answer you soon.
